about: Working as a senior software developer for over a year, i have worked some of the major projects the company's been running with. We mainly specializes in web development with technologies including laravel, react, angularjs, codeigniter and java. I have participated in the web development division and given great results whether its about design decision or development prodigy. I have also had opportunity of being lead for some projects, where i have great job of managing my team and producing maintainable code.

Argalon technologies operates on web and app development with exposure to US clients. Used technologies includes laravel, codeigniter, angularjs and java. I have had the opportunity to work on some great projects including ComeFixMe, which is essentially a clone of TaskRabbit. There were some other in house projects using wordpress api to replicate data to over 100 databases.

A product based food startup, up and running to deliver on your doorstep; all using a web platform. I was responsible for curating the whole platform and evolve it during the period of my services. The main technologies used were Core PHP, jquery and mysql.
